title: Guys this is a scam don't fall for it
selftext:
They just added me randomly i didn't sign up for anything 

But gonna stay in the gc and update you guys


Also didn't know what flair to use so crime
comments: All this hardwork of making subtle differences in DP, haha
It indeed is an elite master bait :p
I’m just saying it’s too early to accuse them of anything. Maybe they’re only hiring twins or even triplets?
